bf.name: Bayer-Flamsteed Combined Designation
bf.data_query: SELECT * FROM catalogue WHERE flam = ? AND bayer = ? AND con = ?
bf.list_query: SELECT flam || ' ' || bayer || ' ' || con AS bf FROM catalogue WHERE bayer IS NOT NULL AND flam IS NOT NULL AND con IS NOT NULL ORDER BY con, flam, bayer;

gaia.name: Gaia Data Release 3 ID
gaia.list_query: SELECT gaia FROM catalogue WHERE gaia IS NOT NULL ORDER BY gaia;

gl.name: Gliese ID
gl.list_query: SELECT gl FROM catalogue WHERE gl IS NOT NULL ORDER BY gl;

hd.name: Henry Draper Catalog ID
hd.list_query: SELECT hd FROM catalogue WHERE hd IS NOT NULL ORDER BY hd;

hip.name: Hipparcos ID
hip.list_query: SELECT hip FROM catalogue WHERE hip IS NOT NULL ORDER BY hip;

hr.name: Harvard/Yale Bright Star Catalog ID
hr.list_query: SELECT hr FROM catalogue WHERE hr IS NOT NULL ORDER BY hr;

hyg.name: HYG v3 Main Catalog ID
hyg.list_query: SELECT hyg FROM catalogue WHERE hyg IS NOT NULL ORDER BY hyg;

id.name: AT-HYG ID
id.list_query: SELECT id FROM catalogue ORDER BY id;

proper.name: Proper Name
proper.list_query: SELECT proper FROM catalogue WHERE proper IS NOT NULL ORDER BY proper;

tyc.name: Tycho-2 ID
tyc.list_query: SELECT tyc FROM catalogue WHERE tyc IS NOT NULL ORDER BY tyc;
